channel.title: Japanese Breakfast on Mackenzie Patel
channel.description: Recent content in Japanese Breakfast on Mackenzie Patel

item.title: Crying in H Mart with the Diving Women of Jeju Island
item.description: An ode to the diving women of Jeju-do I want to be a woman of regimen A bride in her home state A diving woman of Jeju-do I want it all Thus are the opening lines of Diving Woman by Japanese Breakfast, a psychedelic soft rock band with Michelle Zauner on vocals and guitar. It’s been my go-to “bliss out” song for years, and a tune that strikes me even harder after reading Zauner’s memoir, Crying in H Mart.
